title: MXGP3 The Official Motocross Videogame RePack
description:
Date: 2017
Genre: Racing, Motocross, Motorcycles
Developer / Developer: Milestone S.r.l.
Publisher / Publisher: Milestone S.r.l.
Language / Lang: English,
Medicine / Activation: Present (CODEX)

MXGP3 - The Official Motocross Videogame is the third part of the popular series about racing on off-road motorcycles. If it comes to that, then you have even the only official game in which championships and motorcycles are real. In comparison with the previous parts, the engine itself was redesigned, the game process was improved, and the graphics were improved. In general, there is simply no reason to not play the novelty, if you are a bit fond of racing on motorcycles. In total you have prepared 18 tracks, all for official projects and competitions, so that you can test in the highest class all the racers for durability and strength. Racing is waiting for you both off-road, and on the asphalt fast race track.

System requirements:
OS: Windows 7 64-Bit or later
Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K; AMD FX-6350 or equivalent
Memory: 4 GB RAM
Video card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 with 2 GB VRAM or more; AMD Radeon HD 7950 with 2 GB VRAM or more
DirectX: Version 11
Disk space: 13 GB
Sound Card: DirectX compatible
